channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- infinispan
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- infinispan

item.title: CVE-2016-0750|2024-08-05T22:30:04.027Z -- red%20hat -- infinispan
item.description: The hotrod java client in infinispan before 9.1.0.Final automatically deserializes bytearray message contents in certain events. A malicious user could exploit this flaw by injecting a specially-crafted serialized object to attain remote code execution or conduct other attacks.
